channel.title: Linux on 流雲居
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on 流雲居

item.title: Linux 修改键盘映射
item.description: 查看按键键值和映射名 比如查看 Right 键的键值和映射名： 1 xmodmap -pke | grep right -i 结果如下： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 keycode 19 = 0 parenright 0 parenright keycode 35 = bracketright braceright bracketright braceright keycode 85 = KP_Right KP_6 KP_Right KP_6 keycode 114 = Right
